dusting|(n)|việc quét bụi|Ví dụ:|He is doing dusting.
cooking|(n)|nấu ăn|Ví dụ:|I love cooking.
ironing|(n)|việc ủi đồ, là đồ|Ví dụ:|I must do the ironing tonight.
sweep|(v)|quét|Ví dụ:|The kid is sweeping.
wipe|(v)|lau chùi, làm khô, làm sạch|Ví dụ:|She uses clean tissue to wipe the table.
throw out|(phrasal verb)|ném, vứt, bỏ|Ví dụ:|She is throwing out garbage.
vacuum|(v)|làm sạch (cái gì đó) bằng máy hút bụi|Ví dụ:|Have you vacuumed the stairs?
cleaning|(n)|việc dọn dẹp nhà cửa|Ví dụ:|I often do the cleaning at the weekend.
polish|(v)|đánh bóng|Ví dụ:|Mark spent all morning polishing his shoes for the wedding.
fold|(v)|gấp, gập|Ví dụ:|She folded the towel neatly and hung it over the rail.
scrub|(v)|lau, chùi, cọ rửa|Ví dụ:|He is scrubbing the floor.
tighten|(v)|thắt chặt, vặn chặt|Ví dụ:|My brother tighten the bicycle brake.
hang out|(phrasal verb)|phơi đồ ngoài trời|Ví dụ:|Have you hung the clothes|out?
make the bed|(phrase)|dọn giường|Ví dụ:|I have just made the bed.
set the table|(phrase)|bày bàn ăn ra|Ví dụ:|You make the salad and I'll set the table.
clear the table|(phrase)|dọn bàn ăn|Ví dụ:|After you clear the table, we'll play cards.
mow the lawn|(phrase)|cắt cỏ|Ví dụ:|I mow the lawn every week in the summer.
dishwashing|(n)|việc rửa chén đĩa|Ví dụ:|I often do the dishwashing every night.
water the plants|(phrase)|tưới cây|Ví dụ:|My dad often waters the plants in the morning.
clean the kitchen|(phrase)|lau dọn bếp|Ví dụ:|My mom is|the kitchen cleaning.
